io.soliton.protobuf

Class RpcServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.soliton.protobuf.AbstractRpcServer
      • io.soliton.protobuf.RpcServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Server

    public class RpcServer
extends AbstractRpcServer
    Simple implementation of Server using a TCP transport.

    This server uses a proprietary binary protocol to communicate with instances of RpcClient.

    Author:
    Julien Silland (julien@soliton.io)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RpcServer(int port)
      Creates a new server configure to bind to the given TCP port.
